replies.context:
The investigations into Hillary Clinton in 2016 massively affected her poll numbers in a negative fashion.

There is speculation that an indictment would do far worse for Trump endorsed candidates.

The FBI is also under the heavy burden of ensuring that this investigation remains purely about enforcing the law and stays away from the appearance of being political.

Waiting until after the mid-terms is likely necessary not only to appear non-political, but also because of the FBI's internal memo which advises against actions against political candidates within 90 days of an election. 

The mar-a-lago search was conducted just shy of the 90 day mark which is why it seems rushed.
